website_summaries.verdict: If you want a good deal on Taste of the Wild cans and your dog enjoys gravy-infused flavor, this is a solid deal on high-quality dog food.
pros: Made with roasted lamb smothered in gravy – its juicy consistency is an ideal formula for mixing with dry kibble
A good value for premium grain-free cans
cons: While it's a good deal for the canned variety, the cost could still add up if canned is all you feed

customer_reviews.title: Linked to heart disease in dogs
customer_reviews.text: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has identified more than a dozen brands of pet food it says are most frequently connected to a spike in reported cases of heart disease in dogs. The probe now has the agency identifying 16 brands of dog food with the most frequently reported cases of DCM. Acana was named in 67 DCM reports, Zignature in 64 and Taste of the Wild in 53.
customer_reviews.author: lena r

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Thick old rotten and  crushed cans!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a case and every single can had at least a dent! But some were at the popping point. This was a mess!! The food is thick old and rotten! Afraid to feed to my dogs. Guess I'll be going back to chewy for my dog food, including my 2 bags I usually buy per week! This is an awful lot to pay for at least a 3rd of the cans needing to be thrown in the trash for being compromised. It looks like they were stabbed by a forklift or something! NEVER AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: rangergirl10

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog very sick...vomiting and uncontrolled diarrhea.
customer_reviews.text: The vet said that there is new research out on various dog foods. So many types of dog food are making dogs sick. There is now a list of brands to NOT feed your dog. Taste of the Wild was #3 on the list. The vet said the poor Taste-of-the-Wild sales people come into their office and practically beg them to promote their food. The vet says they won't.
customer_reviews.author: LondonderryLady

customer_reviews.title: great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog devours his food when I put a small spoonful of this on top of the dry dog food. It is a little hard on his sensitive tummy but nothing too major (just a little gurgling after eating it). I like that the lid is easy to open and doesn't require a can opener and it's yummy chunks of meat rather than ground mush. Also I can keep it in the fridge for over a week and it doesn't go bad or smell foul in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Kikenie

customer_reviews.title: Over time....
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this for my dog with allergies, he loved it. I loved it because it gave me a break from home cooking his food. The ease of opening a can was great. However over time he began to get very runny poop! Then he had accidents in the house, which has never happened before. I immediately stopped this food. I went back to home cooking. All is well again. I did do some research and found this was not just my dog, it was a side effect for many on this brand of canned dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog super sick and lethargic
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats this food and has for the past year. I noticed a few days into getting this from Amazon she started to act weird. Very lethargic, droopy eyes, super depressed and not her normal self. We took her off the food and within a few days she was back to her normal self. Whatever they claim this is it is not the real deal and this isn’t the only review indicating a sick dog. this seller should be instantly removed from being able to sell this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good food but beware
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves this food. A nice healthy choice for you dog as well. However I've received MANY dented cans that appear to have been dropped before being put in the case. But Amazon's guarantee is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S.

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand. Dog love the lamb flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Sierra mountain/lamb is my dog's favorite flavor. This food (as well as other flavors of this brand) consists of chunks in gravy, not putty. I mix it with dry food to add flavor and have some variety on different days. Will continue to buy. I trust this brand, it has no animal byproducts.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love taste of the wild products
customer_reviews.text: Love taste of the wild products, we mix a little canned with their kibble, but for whatever reason, this last batch caused intestinal issues with my two dogs, removed it from their diet and they have been fine since. Still use TOTW kibble, and have had great success with the other canned flavors, but this has been removed from the rotation.
customer_reviews.author: H. Paczynski

customer_reviews.title: Happy pooches!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff!! The consistency is perfect for mixing with their Taste of the Wild dry food. I've ordered this twice from Amazon now - the first shipment was uneventful and satisfactory. The second, however, wasn't so great. We had to throw out 2 unopened cans because they were damaged, and the food in the remaining cans wasn't so "gravy-like". It was much thicker, similar to how it ends up after being in the fridge overnight. I ended up having to add water to it to loosen it up. My dogs still lapped it up like it was liquid gold though!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Finally! No more gas!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and smells good. My two dogs (who snub their dinner) on occasion, never refuse Taste of the Wild. Best part is that my older dog is not gassy any more! On other pet food she could clear a room!
customer_reviews.author: Leenie

customer_reviews.title: Not good for old dogs needing soft food
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the ingredients of this food are fine, but my old dog won't eat it; I'm going back to the better-textured Canidae canned dog food. I needed soft food because her teeth have given out and her gums were hurting. After antibiotics she recovered her appetite and ate our remaining cans of Canidae with pleasure. But this canned food consists of a thin clear slime with hard little rectangular pellets of extruded meat, a few whole peas, and cubes of potatoes. She can't chew it and she won't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen January

customer_reviews.title: Three Happy Hounds!
customer_reviews.text: This mixed in with the dry kibble of the same variety is a huge score for us. I have 3 dogs and finding a food that they all love can be a challenge. Also, one of my dogs has an Auto-Immune Disease so I an super picky about the brand that I choose. I do like to rotate their protein source so will swutch them to thisevery 6 months or so. Truly, you cannot go wrong with any of Taste of the Wild foods!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty AddictTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not what our dogs like
customer_reviews.text: We buy the dry version of this dog food, but every time we feed our dogs the wet kind from this order, they turn their noses up at it. We thought they were being spoiled so we didn't give them the dry food in the morning. They ate it, but both dogs got sick and threw it up. We wasted our money on these cans. We will just feed them the dry cans from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Alena M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, beware for sensitive dog stomachs
customer_reviews.text: I think this brand does a great job with marketing and packaging, our dog seems to like it and does not get sick while eating it. But we have found that if we feed this to her alone she does get sick. A50 50 mix of dry to wet food seems to be the best on her stomach, makes me think this may be too rich as a standalone for some dogs
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves it, but it smells terrible & gives her terrible gas
customer_reviews.text: Our picky puppy loved this! After trying three dry food brands we decided to give this a whirl. Surprisingly, she ate a whole can (plus some soggy dried kibble mixed in) in one day! Unfortunately, there's a bit of a side effect. I'm not sure if it's the amount she ate or something else, but her um flatulence smells just awful after she ate it. This isn't surprising as the food itself smells pretty nasty right out of the can. I'm glad she's eating so, we'll probably stick with this, but we might play around with the ratio of wet-to-dry food and see if that helps the odor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: The only dry food brand we buy -- and the canned food is an added treat
customer_reviews.text: We already use the dry food in this brand and will never change. Our dogs are not completely satisfied with dry food and so we often augment with fresh refrigerated dog food but decided to also try the canned food. We split a can between two dogs and give them this on top of their dry food and they LOVE it. Has a nice gravy. If they just hear the can open they run to the kitchen. The downside is that it gives one of them smelly gas for an hour or so. Small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality food and a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Our border-collie/boxer/retriever rescue has been on Taste of the Wild wet and dry for almost two years now. She's healthy, happy, energetic, fit, and sports a soft, shiny coat that regularly receives compliments. However much you want credit the food, it certainly isn't hurting! Her vet approves and our puppy is always excited for feeding times.
customer_reviews.author: DFXCrqs

customer_reviews.title: Lots of gravy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my two Corgis. I mix it for them with dry food for their evening meal. Lots of gravy which is good for mixing with dry food, but could used more morsels of meat. Tasty food which my dogs like a lot. Has healthy ingredients without grains. Pop tops for easy opening. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MarleneLouiseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Dogs LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I raise shelties and one is 12 yr old and lost a lot of teeth. I wanted a more natural dog food that is not full of fillers or ingredients I don't want my dogs to have. As soon as they see the can or hear the top pop, they come running. One of them jumps almost knocking the dish off counter because he wants it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Hard chunks hard to digest
customer_reviews.text: I like the dry dog food but this wet dog food my dogs can’t digest it. An hour after eating this they would throw up the same chunks. The chunks are very hard and I guess that’s what makes it so hard to digest by my dogs. I have to mash them before feeding it but because it’s so hard I just have up and chunk it all out.
customer_reviews.author: discount_counts

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and it is very nutritional. The drawback buying them here was almost all the cans came dented. Not just the cans on the outer edges but the center ones were dented as well so it didn't happen in shipping. It made me think they bought seconds from the manufacturer and sold them here at a slight discount.
customer_reviews.author: Sasquatchananda

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are OK with this food, but there is so much gravy. I feel like I'm paying for 3/4 of a can for a full can price. Switched back to a other companies grain free ground meal and is a very full dense can of food. Cans also came dented like in other reviews, but no seals where broken.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love This Food
customer_reviews.text: Our. Dogs really love this food. When they know that I am adding it to their dry food, they go nuts. They attack this food as if "the Russians are down the block"! (See "The Russians Are Coming"!) They really love this food.
customer_reviews.author: 63Vette

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food that the dogs love
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting the TotW dry kibble for quite some time now - but with my older dog getting older he's had a harder time with straight kibble. We now give him half TotW kibble and half of this canned food. It's been easy to sneak his meds in it and he's always excited to hear me pop open a new can. Never had an issue with quality and it feels good giving my pups good quality food that they love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made the dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: We had to stop using Taste of the Wild; for some reason they made the dogs sick. (diarrhea, etc) I was going to call the company -- but then I thought, they'll probably just send us another and I don't want to chance the dogs getting sick. So we just threw out the rest and switched to Wellness.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Baney

customer_reviews.title: Grain Free
customer_reviews.text: My dogs, (2 Boston Terriers) love, love, love Taste of the Wild dog food. Top Quality! Expensive. I try to give my girls the best food and treats I can. I'm confident I am with Taste of the Wild products.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Doc

customer_reviews.title: The best value
customer_reviews.text: For the money this dog food is awesome. check out dogfoodadvisor website and only feed your dog 5 star food like this product. Every dog that I have fed this food does not smell bad, almost no odor at all. I think it's the food.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Strier

customer_reviews.title: My pups loved it but I didn't realize it was clumps in sauce.
customer_reviews.text: I give a tablespoon of wet mixed with my pups dry (chihuahuas) and I had to put the can in my blender with water. It was my fault I didn't read that it was clumpy but nevertheless, they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: The product looks fine, smells good and is packaged nicely. My dog will NOT eat it. My cats will NOT eat it and they love dog food (weird cats). My dog is kind of picky but there's something about this that makes him just walk away. Giving the food to charity. I do feed my dog the kibble and he loves it, so I am not unhappy with the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Scholer

customer_reviews.title: It did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: The best dog food I have ever found. After my breeder recommended the dry food for my puppy, I began researching many dog foods. I feel guilty for all the terrible stuff I have been feeding my 10 year-old Standard Poodle all these years. After only a few weeks on this food, her old coat is shiny again! She plays with her new puppy with incredible energy. Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but my dog was very allergic to this product. Vomiting and bad diarrhea. For days after trying. He liked the taste but we all disliked the results. Back to Taste of the Wild salmon dry food which is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: com) and this canned food has much more gravy than other brands so it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes when our dogs go through the not wanting to eat phase we mix a tiny bit of this into the dry food and they eat it right up. We already religiously use Taste of the Wild dry food (cheaper through Chewy.com) and this canned food has much more gravy than other brands so it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Sunita

customer_reviews.title: Don’t feed grain free!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it, my vet hates it. She says “do not feed your dogs grain free. There is no basis in science to do so and it’s quite dangerous. It’s linked to very serious heart disease.”
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McMains

customer_reviews.title: Very good food
customer_reviews.text: We used this when our boxer was sick and couldn’t hardly eat dry food. Good price. It was recommended by our vet. We still mix it with her dry food at times.
customer_reviews.author: michael anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Taste of the wild brand dog food is good quality food. I have done a lot of research of dog food brands and Taste of the wild always shows up in the list of top quality dog foods. I mix a couple of tablespoon of the wet into her dry kibble and she eats it right up and licks the bowl clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sonize

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality... Not happy
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn't seem to be acting right when he was eating this food. We quit giving my dogs taste of the wild products entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good! I'm sure it tastes good...at least my dogs think so!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and I have one that is a finicky eater. You wouldn't know it to look at her but if I try to give her "just" dry food, I get a "seriously??" look from her. I have two big dogs and I use about two tablespoons plus two tablespoons of water-mix it, heat it (yes!) and divide it amongst their bowls of dry food and mix. I have decreased their dry food (also taste of the wild) to balance the addition of the wet so that they keep their girlish figures! Winner combo!
customer_reviews.author: lauraloveschocolate

customer_reviews.title: ost wet foods which look like meat paste (like a can of refried beans)
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my dogs go crazy for this stuff. Just tried it on a whim (it was on sale), and unlike m!ost wet foods which look like meat paste (like a can of refried beans), this stuff has gravy and little chunks of meat and potato. And it is rated as a five star food on Dog Food Advisor. I'll be buying more once we go through our two cases!
customer_reviews.author: D. Shank

customer_reviews.title: Premium Dog Food at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: TOTW is an excellent dog food with great ratings from the Dog Food Advisor. My dogs love all the varieties and they are economical which is rare in premium dog foods.
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: Taste of The Wild, can dog food
customer_reviews.text: Our French Bull had some minor surgery on his throat to correct some breathing issues. We got this for his recovery. Of course we had to order enough for both Frenchies. (You can't have just one). Both loved it. We normally feed them Taste of The Wild dry. No issues with the temporary change.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like the dog food and have ordered it in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the dog food and have ordered it in the past and been happy. However, after I used the first 2 cans, I noted that almost every can had big dents in them. I had to throw one unopened can away as it was so dented that the top budged and I was worried it would be contaminated. I'm reluctant to order a case again.
customer_reviews.author: pegO

customer_reviews.title: My two dogs love this food and their skin has improved along with ...
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love this food and their skin has improved along with the shine of their coat. Our one dog, which is a terrier mix has many skin allergies and this food seems to be helping her condition. We also have her on Taste of the Wild dry food. No digestion problems in either dog. I recomend this high quality brand. We have only tried the Pacific Stream formulary as suggested by our Vet.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R

customer_reviews.title: Canned Stew
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like it. Gentle enough for the sensitive stomach. Shepard loves it. He jumps for this when served. I buy this on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: but my Dobie pup loved this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I dont write a lot of reviews, but my Dobie pup loved this stuff. I mix a spoonful with his kibble and this is the first time he sat and ate without taking a bite and then running around the house. Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Mabe

customer_reviews.title: Ick...
customer_reviews.text: Did not like dealing with this flavor at all, super gooey, kind of gross. The meat chunk were cubes and just the whole product seemed very artificial. I did not smell or look to me as though I were giving my pups a quality product. Should have tried a single can before diving in and buying a case.... We had been using the Chicken/Turkey before and prefer that flavor 10 times to this one, however, we have since decided to go Freeze-Dried/Dehydrated route with other brands to supplement the Taste of the Wild kibble we continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: mambomir

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog very sick :(
customer_reviews.text: Baby wouldn’t eat and he was sick (vomiting and diarrhea) for more than a week. Took him to the vet $$$$ because I was worried and they have him medicine to make him regular and calm his stomach. Threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. It's hard for us to find a good food he likes with all the allergies he has. I highly recommend...he licked his bowl clean.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Morehead

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love the dry Taste of the Wild but all 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love the dry Taste of the Wild but all 3 turned their noses up at the gravy in this food; they all picked out the meat and avoided the gravy sauce. We ended up giving all the remaining cans to some homeless people who had dogs
customer_reviews.author: Janice P.

customer_reviews.title: Must be tasty
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs have been on TOTW dry chow for years. Both are shiny, bright eyed, muscular, and at ideal weight. Thought I would try some canned food to give them a treat and ordered a case of EVO and the TOTW. My dogs aren't very excited about the EVO, but they really go after this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: a cook by necessity

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this dog food. One of the dogs is allergy prone but this food does not cause any allergic reactions. It is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: juelanne dalzell

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it! I add it to their kibble along ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it! I add it to their kibble along with mashed carrots or pumpkin and they enjoy it so much more. Package always arrives in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my bulldog....she loves it and health and coat way better since fed this compared ro purina
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: good quality and Sigmund loves it!
customer_reviews.text: my little Sigmund really loves this dog food! Good quality, healthy ingredients. The company that manufacturers this has had very few recalls.
customer_reviews.author: rural girl

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dogs, Happy Owners
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't find our dogs food, anywhere! We shopped in a couple of towns, but no one had it. We figured there must have been some kind of problem, cause it wasn't even available on the internet. Finally, Amazon had it in stock, so we jumped on it. Our dogs are eating again! This is their absolute favorite food! We pair it up with the Taste of the Wild dry (same favor) and they are happy, happy!!
customer_reviews.author: sylviat

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the Lamb.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love the taste of two of the three cases I ordered. Something was off on the last case as the dogs had diarrhea and vomiting and stopped eating the food. I ended up throwing the rest of the cans away. I would avoid the Lamb, there's a reason its only $15 a case.
customer_reviews.author: Danger Mouse

customer_reviews.title: but our dogs did enjoy this wet food
customer_reviews.text: I still prefer the dry food, but our dogs did enjoy this wet food. The gravy makes it super messy though so I was glad when it was gone and will probably not buy it again. If you're used to wet food being messy like that though then yes I would recommend this. The dry food just set better with their stomachs I think.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Dog gone good
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has special issues. This is good food (I am assuming because he eats it, no personal experience)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Livermore

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I knew she loved this food, I bought it on amazon only because I was too lazy to go to the pet store. I only gave her food with natural ingredient and she gobbled it up.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: Good product arrived on time, not best for my dog with atopic dermatitis but in emergency, it will be good option
customer_reviews.author: Da Stinky PiG

customer_reviews.title: Taste of the Wild Canned Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This is a really a great dog food ~ fresh salmon and smoked salmon in gravy. The smell will knock you over, but our dog is very sensitive to grains; he loves "Taste of the Wild" and his health has improved dramatically. It's nutritious, no grain, no fillers or added preservatives.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend all Taste of the Wild products... This canned product is in the form of chunks (which I mix with Taste of the Wild kibbles). Dogs love it; but be aware that this product is in the form of chunks and gravy.... I mix with Taste of the Wild kibbles....
customer_reviews.author: E. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful seller first off
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful seller first off.... Second of all this product is one of the best for dogs. It is grain free which is another bonus if your dog possibly has a grain allergy. My dog loves this! She goes crazy when I pull one of the cans out. I would definitely recommend this to any dog owners :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Presta

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with the dogs
customer_reviews.text: My bad that I didn't realize it was not ground. However it didn't seem to bother the dogs at all. They scarfed it right up without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Dogs hate taste, but cat eats it :) we are changing flavors it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: Diamondhog

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVES this food!!!
customer_reviews.text: Due to food allergies with our dog we changed her to this grain-free food about 3 months ago have not have been disappointed. My dog LOVES this food. We give her the dry food on a daily basis and use the canned food as a treat once a month when giving the heart worm meds. When I start to open the can she is bouncing around like a puppy waiting for the food and it is gone in 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: DDAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: First thing I notice was the cans were dented pretty bad, also my pup threw up after eating it. I will never feed my pup this food again.
customer_reviews.author: tru327

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it !
customer_reviews.text: my dogs smelled this from the other end of the house and came running for it the very first time I opened a can. I use this as a weekend treat to change up the lineup. They love it, and no issues of vomit or gas thus far. I add it to their dry food.
customer_reviews.author: fred flintstone

customer_reviews.title: My lucky girl loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog just loves this food. I am always skeptical with new food because she has a real sensitive stomach. Feeding her this about a week and no issues. She would normally leave a bit of food leftover in her bowl but she licks it clean now. I got this for the vitamins etc that she needs. Also her coat is shinier than ever
customer_reviews.author: William burke

customer_reviews.title: Taste of the Wild Canned Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. It's the little extra I add to their Grain-free dry dog food also by Taste of the Wild. Looks like stew with chunks mixed into gravy like mix. I warm it up for 30 secs in the microwave. I know, I know...they're ma babies. Happy, healthy ones too, thanks to Taste of the Wild.
customer_reviews.author: Joys

customer_reviews.title: Cans come damaged BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes the food, and I like the delivery convince, but when 6 of the cans look like this, not counting 2 leakers I tossed out, it is a very bad value. Happens every time, but this was the first for leakers.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Tansey

customer_reviews.title: Great brand, stinky food.
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is great for any pup! My dog is always on ToTW dry food and figured I would spoil her with some soft, real meat, premium canned food. This made my dog have diarrhea and her mouth stunk as the food got everywhere. She is a lab and I don't expect her to smell great after she eats as it is not the products fault. However, the digestion issue worries me but it could be switching her diet from dry to canned food.
customer_reviews.author: JWN

customer_reviews.title: I am mixing one of these cans with the Pacific ...
customer_reviews.text: I am mixing one of these cans with the Pacific stream dry dog food so that my little chi-poo eats... She used to be a grazer here and there but would never actually finish a meal appropriate for her size. I mix one can with about 7 cups of dry dog food so that it lasts me a while and it does the trick to get my little girl to eat.
customer_reviews.author: LindsB

customer_reviews.title: My senior dog loves TOTW!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good canned dog food! Most are made of sugar. Not Taste of the Wild. My senior dog has eaten this for years with kibble. He’s 12 amd still very healthy. I give this a top rating.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Chase

customer_reviews.title: Dogs will enjoy eating this!
customer_reviews.text: A healthy dog food my dogs will eat! I make most of my dog's food, but occasionally I like to swap in a can of food. This is one they seem to like, so I've kept it on hand for a while now.
customer_reviews.author: LuvLit

customer_reviews.title: Super delicious
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loved this food and now we are hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Storyteller

customer_reviews.title: Roasted Duck
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves anything duck flavored and really likes this canned food.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Barton

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: My pups love taste of the wild and I'm happy I have a reasonably priced grain quality dog food to feed them. They don't get the cans very often but they always love it when they do.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Saint Bernard and Yorkie approved
customer_reviews.text: While ordering this I rescued a saint and we were switching him from "filler" type kibble to TOTW pacific stream and of course, he's been finicky because he's going from junk food to great food. Like getting a child to put down the cookies and juice and have broccoli and chicken instead.... not gonna happen. So- ordered the canned TOTW and now- my Saint tries to get at the bowl before I put it down for him..... Very very pleased with this purchase- 4 paws up!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: thepak92

customer_reviews.title: Rather expensive but good dog food
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of food my dog eats. She is a 60 lb dog and eats one to two cans a day plus her dry food. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pack

customer_reviews.title: Propeller tail
customer_reviews.text: I always feed my dogs high-quality food, so they are used to it. However, I have never seen one of my dogs as happy as he was after trying this for the first time yesterday. He was running around with his tail wagging in a full circle! Must be good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Must be delish the way the scarf it down
customer_reviews.text: The dogs and cats live it. But don’t eat at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The picture on the front and the statement that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the front and the statement that is made intrigued me into thinking this dogfood may delicious for my two little dogs, but they avoided from the get go!!! How the if I fed the food from my hand instead of the bowl both dogs would consume a small amount of the wet food. The bowl was clean but this problem would happen every time I fed When was totally consumed I did not order again!
customer_reviews.author: Bismarck

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal at $25!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this stuff.. mix with Dynovite and you have an easy fix meal! Beware of the pricing on this item. After my first order and just days later the price nearly doubled. I wrote a review which Amazon would not publish...and two days later, the price was back down to $25, shipped.
customer_reviews.author: W. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: We have been eating this product for years; the ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been eating this product for years; the wild-gamey taste is just irresistible, the grain-free option is ideal for my irritable bowel syndrome and the handy pull tab tops make having some on the go a no-brainer. We have reconsidered sharing with our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: spark

customer_reviews.title: Dogs seems to enjoy eating it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs seems to enjoy eating it. Bought due to our little dog needing extra calories to gain weight so we add some to his dry food and he doesn't seem to have any issues with it or dislike for it.
customer_reviews.author: P.Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the flavor
customer_reviews.text: This variety of Taste of the Wild (TOTW) is OK (Miss Picky Eater, MPE, won't eat it but that's somewhat par for the course). I've seen other dogs slurp it up. I'd recommend staying away from the bison flavor....the gas the dogs develop is something I hope and pray I never smell again! MPE even developed gas after eating a few bites and in a year she had never, until eating bison flavor TOTW, developed gas.
customer_reviews.author: mjbbeads1

customer_reviews.title: My Dog LOVES This Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog is an oddly picky eater. There is no rhyme or reason to what she will eat and what she won't, but since I bought this food, she comes running over to her bowl to eat. Darned stuff smells so good, I've been half-tempted to try some myself. She's been eating it for the past week or so, and no adverse affects (well, a little gassy, but I think that will pass once she gets fully used to her new diet). Great ingredients, no grain, awesome food!
customer_reviews.author: Wisqerbee

customer_reviews.title: Warning cans were dented!! Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: Uggh...When dog food is cheap, we stock pile. I bought the case dog food and left it in the box. Then I started to smell something in the kitchen. I opened up the box and found the broken cans of dog food. One the seal broke that bugs started to grow. I didn't drop the cans because the cans were already dented and then packed! They were hidden in the middle out of 12 cans there were 5 that the cans were dented. As one knows, the denting of the cans ruins the seal and makes the food spoiled. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: WeShopYouSave

customer_reviews.title: arlene approved
customer_reviews.text: my pit loves it, she normally gets dry but every couple days its like a treat in a can
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: My dogs allergies are better on this
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this and it's the only food that my dogs aren't allergic to. This cleared up my last dogs ear allergies as well. I don't know why I switched away.
customer_reviews.author: Lona

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it. They actually show up at meal time and eat all of their food. Looks and smells fairly good for canned dog food. Takes the guesswork out of "will my dog like it"? Pleased with product line, will use brand as my regular dog food from now on.
customer_reviews.author: murkyatthebottom

customer_reviews.title: Cans Dented
customer_reviews.text: That past two times I've purchased this product it has arrived with more than 50% of the cans significantly dented. I worry about contamination and also a lid will not fit on the can when it is dented.
customer_reviews.author: dmmcdon

customer_reviews.title: Not a unique animal protein...it’s beed
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a unique protein for a dog with allergies or other issues do not buy! The first ingredient is beef, not bison. In fact bison is the 6th ingredient. It was a big waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: NMH

customer_reviews.title: Won't use this again......
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the Taste of th Wild dry dog food and do very well on it, but when i mixed in the wet canned srew dog food they both developed severe diaherria. Once i discontinued the wet canned dog food from Taste of the Wild it cleared right up. Sorry........
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food and great pricing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been please with this product, my Boxer is also on the kibble of the same variety and she is thriving on it. I have priced it at my local Dog Food/Farm and garden supply, Amazon prices are better and best of all it is delivered to my door!!!! Garden Rose
customer_reviews.author: Garden Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dog went "grain free" years ago and her incessant itching stopped, her hair filled back in and is happier overall. She loves TOTW! And it's within pennies of the price in a local store but it is shipped to my front door!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TADTE OF THE WILD DOG FOOD!!
customer_reviews.text: Taste of the Wild dog food contains pesticides!!! I have ordered hundreds of dollars of this dog food and should be reimbursed!! The hounda at the rescue I donate this food to could be seriously ill or die from Taste of the Wild!! Amazon stop selling this garbage!!! Had to rate, but this deserves no stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the dry I am going to supplement some of the wet food also
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been on Taste of the Wild for several years. She is getting older and I decided to buy some of the canned wet food to mix with the dry. She especially likes the Salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog cry
customer_reviews.text: The first order I received was great--very meaty and my dog gobbled it up in no time at all. The second order I received was very soupy. At first my dog tolerated it, but then began to whine when it was in his food and eventually refused to eat it at all. My dog, like most, eats basically anything, so this was completely bewildering. It's sad that there isn't any kind of consistency, which is key to ordering this food in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

product_meta.title: Taste of the Wild High Protein Real Meat Grain-Free Recipes Wet Canned Dog Food, Made With Superfoods and Other Premium Ingredients That Include Sources of Vitamins and Antioxidants
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Sierra Mountain - Lamb| Size:13.2oz Case of 12| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe balanced diet that nature intended. Modern science proves that your dog shares the DNA of the wolf. Years of domestication and excellent care have turned your dog from a short-lived potential foe to a long-lived best friend. Although their DNA remains the same and their tastes demand something of the wild, their diet should provide them with all the proper ingredients and nutrition they need to thrive. Your dog craves tastes from their wild past. Go ahead and give them one.
feature_bullets: A taste of the wild with REAL LAMB as the #1 ingredient in a tasty STEW; optimal amino acid profile, PROTEIN rich for LEAN, STRONG MUSCLES
Premium ingredients with added vitamins & minerals; fruits and vegetables as SUPERFOODS for hard-working ANTIOXIDANTS; fatty acid blend for SKIN & COAT
Ingredients From Trusted, Sustainable Sources Around The World; Made With No Grain, Corn, Wheat, Filler; No Artificial Flavors, Colors, Preservatives Added
Nutrient rich and HIGHLY DIGESTIBLE with PREBIOTIC FIBER and nutrients from sweet potatoes, blueberries, and raspberries
MADE in the USA; FAMILY OWNED & run; food made with scientifically advanced food safety protocols; We'd appreciate your CALL 800.342.4808
